title: Giro d’Italia Stage 8: Plapp Powers to First Grand Tour Stage Win, Ulissi Nabs Pink Jersey
content:
Ulissi grabs Maglia Rosa to end long Italian wait, Plapp puts in huge effort from day’s breakaway to secure biggest success.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 8: Plapp Powers to First Grand Tour Stage Win, Ulissi Nabs Pink Jersey on Velo.
author: sstokes
